question: ばかばかしい
sourceMnemonic: Remember how you learned that <ja>馬鹿</ja> means "idiot?" Well put two idiots together and everything they say and do is absolutely <vocabulary>absurd</vocabulary>. Remember how <vocabulary>ridiculous</vocabulary> that "Dumb and Dumber" movie was? Yeah. Like that.
sourceReadingMnemonic: You already learned <ja>馬鹿</ja>, so as long as you can remember it twice in a row, you should be able to read this too!
